message.body: You again!!! Are we the only 2 people left in this study?!? Hows the beach? I'm headed to Asheville, NC.
Maybe we're the only two left. Ha! I've heard Asheville is lovely. The beach is nice, heading down to the water soon. Drive safe!
That bodes well for us in the weekly drawing then, i guess. Yeah, Aville is fantastic. Just got back from a nice hike out to a beautiful, raging waterfall.
That sounds nice. Its hot here, so after swimming for a bit I'm now reading. Then back to real world tomorrow. How long are you in asheville for?
